AbstractEditor::Backspace()

Reimplemented from MultiMediaEditor.

Model * EmsEditor::CreateModel (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

Factory method for creating a model. Must be implemented by every class, which needs it's own model. By default a component has no model and 0 is returned. If a model is dynamically created by 'new', it must be deleted in the destructor by e. g. delete GetModel();.

Returns:
Pointer to the model.

Reimplemented from MultiMediaEditor.

void EmsEditor::OnItemMarked (  const AbstractEditorItem *  item  )  [virtual]
 

Is invoked, in the read-only-mode, when an Abstract-Editor-Item is marked.

Parameters:
item Marked item (0, if no item is marked).
